Package de.Lathanael.BinaryFileDB.BaseClass

Class Summary
BaseRecordsFile Abstract class providing basic functions to create low-level binary file database.
Counter A basic counter.
DataWriteQueue Implements a simple Queue to lesser the IO of the harddisk by reducing write accesses.
DbByteArrayOutputStream Extends ByteArrayOutputStream to provide a way of writing the buffer to a DataOutput without re-allocating it.
IndexEntry IndexEntry object for the DB-file index header
JavaModUTFConverter Modified implementation of the readUTF() and writeUTF(String s) methods
for the modified UTF-8 format found in DataInput and DataOutput
Original Code by Oracle.
RecordsFile Implements BaseRecordsFile to create a low-level binary file database.
RRWLock An implementation of a fully reentrant Read-Lock and Write-Lock
